episodesJson.title: Various artists
episodesJson.description: A survey of classic jazz recordings, most of which are original 78 RPM versions. This program features "Then You're Drunk" by Ed Thompson; "I Want to Linger" by Pete Daily; "Heartbeat" by Max Miller; "Give Me a Pig's Foot and a Bottle of Beer" by Bessie Smith; and "Little Benny" by Clyde Hort.
